message: If you would like to learn about the future of identity, this is a great talk by Microsoft in the Cloud Identity Summit about the status of Identity and its future, both consumer and enterprise.
story: Tarek Dawoud shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: CIS 2016 Tuesday, June 7- Keynote Identity Everywhere with Strong Security - Alex Simons
caption: youtube.com
description: Speaker: Alex Simons - Partner Director of Program Management; Active Directory, Microsoft. Digital identity has evolved rapidly in the last year. Enterprise...
